title: Rift of Hell-Demons War
description: Hordes of insidious demons are lurking in the hellish catacombs! Can you challenge hundreds of hellish creatures and destroy them all as you descend closer to the citadel? You have several types of weapons at your disposal and an almost endless supply of ammo along the way! With each step, collecting gold that falls from enemies, you will become stronger and stronger, strength, speed of movement, arsenal of deadly weapons, armor - all this will depend on your actions.
instructions: Use mouse or WASD to move. Rotate - mouse. Shoot - spacebar or left mouse button.

title: Shape Transform Blob Racing
description: Shape Transform: Blob Racing is a casual running game. In this game, you will control a little Blob, running, shape-shifting, and go through various challenges! It would help if you quickly switched the Blob’s shape while running to navigate various obstacles. For example, turning into a ball helps you roll through narrow passages. When you become a square, it helps you cross flat areas more easily.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Digital Circus Find The Differences
description: Step into the whimsical and wacky world of Digital Circus: Find The Differences, where fun meets challenge! Explore vibrant and surreal circus scenes filled with unique characters and zany details, all while sharpening your observation skills. Can you spot the subtle changes between two seemingly identical pictures? Put your eyes to the test and discover how many differences you can find in this exciting puzzle adventure!
instructions: Mouse click

title: The Office Escape
description: The Office Escape is an exciting adventure where every step towards freedom becomes a test for the Regime and the thinking factor!
instructions: You need to shoot at enemies, close cranes and destroy doors. PC - shooting is carried out with the left mouse button Mobile devices - shooting is carried out by tapping on the screen

title: Mobile Legends Slime 3v3
description: Mobile Legends Slime 3v3 will bring you into a fun arena of exciting battles! In this 3v3 PvP game, you can unblock many slime characters. Enter a variety of colorful battle scenes. Each character has unique skills and fighting styles, ensuring you find the best gameplay.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Mahjong Connect Cookware
description: Help your chef to clean his kitchen and remove all cookware by connecting them with a line that can change it's direction no more than 2 times!
instructions: use your mouse to connect cookware

title: Digit Shooter
description: Digit Shooter! plays like a vertical-version shooting running arcade game. With 3D green numbers, you can launch green numbers to shoot green numbers and numbered walls. You can shoot them and collect them to make your number bigger. Don't waste bullets and time on red walls while avoiding them. When you reach the finish line, try to focus on one line to shoot, then you will collect more rewards
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Skating Park
description: Welcome to Skating Park, where skateboards meet high-speed racing madness! Dive into a world of adrenaline-fueled stunts and fierce competition as you shred through gravity-defying tracks. Master insane ramps, outmaneuver opponents, and conquer the leaderboard. Feel the thrill as you jump off the track, taking daring shortcuts to gain the edge. Get ready to grind and glide your way to victory!
instructions: - Move the player left/right by dragging the mouse left/right. - Jump off the track and find another track for a shortcut - Throw enemies off the track by hitting them

title: GT Cars City Racing
description: GT Cars City Racing is a driving game with a fantastic open world, epic stunts and magnificent super stylized cars! The game, which brings many innovations and game-play to its previous series GT Cars Mega Ramps, has different surprises waiting for you in its 2nd series. The open world, which is especially demanded by the players, was designed as a Toy City. Incredible shows in the Toy City offer a dazzling game-play experience and never-ending action!
instructions: Player 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" NOS: "L-SHIFT" Restart car position: "R" Change camera view: "C" Player 2: Move: "ARROW KEYS" NOS: "N" Restart car position: "L" Change camera view: "U"

title: Bubble Shooter Candy Wheel Level Pack
description: Bubble Shooter Candy Wheel Level Pack is a fun and challenging game where you shoot candy bubbles to match three or more on a rotating wheel. Use power-ups like the Bomb to blast nearby candies and the Stopwatch to freeze time for unlimited moves. Earn coins by clearing levels and use them to unlock more exciting levels. With increasing difficulty and sweet rewards, this game promises endless fun. Spin, aim, and conquer the candy wheel!
instructions: Use your mouse or touchpad to play—simply tap aim and shoot candy bubbles onto the rotating wheel. It's easy, intuitive, and fun!

title: Gravity Matcher
description: In Gravity Matcher, you’ll launch circles of various sizes and types into a dynamic gravity field. Your goal? Match identical circles by carefully aiming and timing your throws. But beware – gravity is unpredictable, and the slightest miscalculation can send your circles spiraling out of control!
instructions: Tap and Drag to aim, Release mouse button to shoot

title: Zombie Siege.io
description: As a soldier at the last base with unlimited potential, you must arm yourself and battle against dangerous zombies! Use your wisdom to select the best weapons, skills, and talents to defend against waves of zombies. How many maps will you be able to save?
instructions: Click to interact, drag, and place weapons.

title: Frog.io
description: Frog io is a 2D PvP game where players control frogs battling for dominance. Use your frog's tongue to devour other players and grow bigger and stronger! As you explore the map, eat fruits and enemy frogs to boost your size and power. But beware other players are after you too! Outsmart them, grow massive, and become the top frog in this dynamic and competitive io game.
instructions: Touch to move and Release to attack

title: Noob Legends Dungeon Adventures
description: Dive into a thrilling 2D action-platformer! Battle zombies, drones, upgrade weapons, rescue friends, & uncover hidden secrets!
instructions: Q - change weapons; A, D (left and right arrows) - move; E - apply / activate; W (space) - jump, press again double jump; S (down arrow) - crouch. Mouse - aim / shoot; For mobile devices, use touch input.

title: Imposter Coloring Book
description: Get ready for a colorful twist on the mystery and excitement of the Imposter Coloring Book! Inspired by the thrilling world of imposters, this coloring app lets you bring your favorite characters to life with vibrant colors and unique brush styles. Choose from various brushes, including pastel, watercolor, and pencil, to add a unique touch to each crewmate, imposter, and spaceship scene. Whether you prefer bold colors or a soft pastel look, every coloring page is yours to make unique.
instructions: Tap image to color

title: Roblox Christmas Dressup
description: Roblox Christmas Dressup is a delightful dress-up game where players embrace the festive spirit by customizing their avatars with Christmas-themed outfits and accessories. The game offers a wide variety of styles to explore, from cozy winter wear to glamorous holiday ensembles. Perfect for fashion enthusiasts and Roblox fans alike, Roblox Christmas Dressup brings creativity and joy to the holiday season.
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Nutcracker New Years Adventures
description: Welcome to the world of a fairy tale, where two princesses are preparing for a series of winter holidays. Each of the princesses is working on creating her own unique New Year's outfit, inspired by Hoffmann's mystical fairy tales and Tchaikovsky's classical ballet. Immersing themselves in the atmosphere of New Year's magic, players will be able not only to dress princesses, but also to develop their sense of style. Get ready for an unforgettable adventure and create your own New Year's image!
instructions: Help two princess girlfriends create unusual festive outfits in the style of fairy tales about the Nutcracker. The most successful images can be saved at the end of the game in the form of PNG images. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: Fidget Trading Card Toy
description: Fidget Trading Card Toy is a fidget trading game that allows you to feel the fun of collecting toy cards! In the game, you will flip cards against opponents and even use the slap feature to set off a fierce trading duel! Your goal is to collect as many rare cards as possible, increase your card collection, and gain more advantages in trading!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Dino Egg Shooter
description: Dino Egg Shooter is a fun and addictive puzzle game set in a colorful prehistoric world. With 100 levels of increasing difficulty, players aim and shoot colorful dino eggs to clear the board. Each level presents unique challenges, from tricky formations to limited shots. Easy controls and charming visuals make Dino Egg Shooter perfect for all ages. So, get ready
instructions: Follow the game instructions

title: Special Holiday Solitaire
description: Step into a festive world of fun with Special Holiday Solitaire! This cheerful card game combines classic solitaire gameplay with a holiday twist, creating the perfect escape for players of all ages. Whether you're looking for a relaxing break or a way to get into the holiday spirit, *Special Holiday Solitaire* is the perfect companion for the season. Challenge yourself, enjoy the magic of the holidays, and spread the festive cheer!
instructions: Use the mouse to play

title: Real Street Fighter 3D
description: Real Street Fighter 3D have very addictive game-play and many missions. In this you have to fight with other enemies and have to complete mission. It has many addictive missions.
instructions: Use W,A,S,D OR Arrows key for player movement. Use X for Punch Use Z for Kick Use C for Grab Use Space Bar For Jump

title: RiddleMath
description: Play RiddleMath online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Mine FPS shooter: Noob Arena
description: Enter dynamic arenas packed with relentless enemies, each wave more challenging than the last! Equip yourself with 7 different weapons and 5 types of armor to face off against diverse foes. With unique square graphics and three arenas to conquer, gear up for the ultimate boss battle at the end!
instructions: Keyboard/Mouse Control: TAB - Menu WASD - Movement Left mouse button - shooting Right mouse button - reload 1-7 - Weapon selection Mobile control: Left side of the screen - Movement Right side of the screen - Look around Automatic shooting

title: Bunny Boy Online
description: Play the exciting online game. Variety of weapons, grenades, maps to choose from, various game modes, dynamic gameplay. Play with friends to the game!
instructions: Control Bunny and Shot!

title: 2048 Puzzle: Connect the Balls
description: Ready for a challenging puzzle that tests your logic and tactics? Welcome to "2048 Puzzle: Connect the Balls"! Game Features: Aim and shoot balls to connect; Use bombs to clear balls; Score points, set records, and outplay others! Spend your time wisely and show off your intellectual skills in "2048 Puzzle: Connect the Balls"!
instructions: Merge balls with the same numbers to create higher values and reach 2048. Plan each move carefully to avoid getting stuck.

title: City Banana Man Agent
description: Begin an interesting fighting experience in City Banana Man Agent! You'll play as a strange banana agent passing busy city streets. Choose a spot to land and start exploring this wonderful city.Find the target and complete the task. And show your driving skills. Equipped with many powerful weapons and shoot enemies. Aim your gun at the enemy and attack him.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Black Pink Christmas Concert
description: If you’re a fan of Black Pink, the Black Pink Christmas Concert Dress Up game is perfect for you. This game lets you style the members of Black Pink for their exciting holiday concert. Whether you’re a Black Pink fan or love fashion, this game offers endless styling options. Celebrate the magic of Christmas while showing off your creativity.
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: We Will Not Survive
description: Survive the apocalypse in We Will Not Survive, an idle tower defense game! Upgrade weapons, harvest resources, and fight relentless zombie waves to protect your base. Are you ready to defend and thrive?
instructions: The game is controlled by the mouse. You can control the speed of zombie attacks, as well as turn off music, sounds in the game. By clicking on "?" you can see explanations for each action icon.

title: Gloves Grow Rush
description: “Gloves Grow Rush” is a 3D arcade game where you control stickman boxers in a vertical running challenge. Collect boxing gloves, battle weaker opponents, and take on the final boss at each level. If you encounter a stronger boxer, evade rather than fight to survive. Beware: a direct punch means game over! Claim gems to upgrade your starting level and attack power (ATK). The shop offers 6 unique boxing gloves, but they don’t grant extra ATK or levels. Best of luck!
instructions: Hold and swipe = move left and right

title: Solitaire Winter
description: It’s cold outside and you’re snowed in with a game of Solitaire! Travel the icy land and rebuild 5 beautiful winter locations across 200 levels, plus unlock 18 bonus game variants like Klondike, Spider and Freecell! Overcome obstacles like locks, frozen cards, chains, vines, and more to collect the bonus gems and coins in each level which you can spend in the shop for upgrades. Choose between multiple card decks, but don’t freeze up as you go for the elusive 3 stars on every level!
instructions: Remove all cards from the tableau. Play any face-up card that is one higher or lower than the stock card.

title: Xmas Presents Mahjong
description: Match three of the same tiles. Click on a tile to move it to the collection spots at the bottom. If you have collected three of the same tiles there, they will be removed.
instructions: Click on a tile to move it to the collection spots at the bottom.

title: Bubble Merge 2048
description: Welcome to Bubble Merge 2048, where classic 2048 meets exciting bubble-blasting action! Shoot, merge, and blast through puzzles filled with colourful bubbles and challenges. Match numbers and colours, solve brain-teasing puzzles, and smash obstacles as you journey through this one-of-a-kind adventure.
instructions: - Swipe, Aim & Shoot: Fire your ball at matching numbers and colours. - Merge for Victory: Combine bubbles to create higher numbers and reach the target. - Break Obstacles: Smash through barrels and boxes to clear the level.

title: Pushover 3D
description: Unleash your creativity in *Pushover 3D*! Draw unique curves to control your ragdoll fighter’s moves, launching them in unexpected ways to defeat opponents. Each match is a wild, physics-based showdown where every line transforms into unpredictable body motions. From wild spins to slingshot leaps, it’s all up to the patterns you create. Experiment, outsmart your rivals, and become a master of ragdoll combat!
instructions: Draw curves, and your character will throw their body in a similar way. Fight off your opponents by being as creative as you can!

title: Tank Fury: Boss Battle 2D
description: Welcome to the world of tanks of the game "Tank Fury: Boss Battle 2D"! There are various tanks available in the game that can be controlled and pumped: T-60, T-54, T-70, IS-3, PLACES. Each of them has its own unique characteristics and capabilities. Choose your favorite tank and go to the battlefield!
instructions: Upgrade your tank and fight! PC control (keyboard + mouse): "A and D" for movement; "W and S" for aiming; "Space bar" for attack. To control from your phone, use the buttons on the screen.

title: City Drift Racing
description: "City Drift Racing" is an atmospheric racing arcade game where crazy competitions await you on the streets of the metropolis.
instructions: The goal of the game is to become a street racing legend by tackling dangerous tracks, upgrading your race cars, demonstrating your handling skills and winning in various racing modes to reach the top of the leaderboard and gain recognition in the world of street racing competitions. Controls on desktop: WASD, Space. Control on a mobile device: touch/swipe.

title: Elite Chess
description: Enjoy classic gameplay with three chess modes, each offering varying time settings suited to your play style. Take your chess skills to the next level, climb the ranks from Bronze to Diamond, and strive to become a top chess player.
instructions: Select a Bullet, Blitz or Classic mode and make your moves on the chessboard. Each mode features a distinct play duration and time increment per turn. Win matches to earn ELO points and advance through ranks, improving your strategies as you progress.

title: Pet Salon Simulator
description: It's a very busy day at the pet salon! Jump in and give our furry friends the full treatment. Wash, groom, and style them to look even more charming and adorable. Show off your grooming skills and create picture-perfect transformations that will make every pet leave feeling proud and confident!
instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

title: Real Driving Simulator
description: Real Driving Simulator is a realistic driving simulation game that lets you fully enjoy the thrill of driving and racing! In this game, you can unblock various vehicles and drive them through cities and tracks. Experience the real feel of being behind the wheel.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Ships 3D IO
description: Ships 3D is an IO game, multiplayer sailing ship simulator. The game is played in 'first person' where you control the sailor and move around the ship; interacting with the helm, sails and cannons. Sink enemy ships and shoot other players to score points.
instructions: - W A S D to move around - Mouse to look around - Click to shoot and swipe sword - F to interact with cannons, steering and sails, pickup items and drop them, respawn after swimming for 5 seconds or more - E Switch weapon - 1,2 Switch weapon

title: Battleship
description: Battleship is a classic strategy game where you compete against an enemy to sink their fleet of ships. Each player places their ships on a hidden grid and takes turns guessing the locations of the opponent’s ships. The first player to sink all of the enemy’s ships wins the game. It’s a test of strategy, memory, and luck!
instructions: Setup: Place your fleet of ships on your grid. Ships can be placed horizontally or vertically but not diagonally. Gameplay: Take turns with the enemy to call out grid coordinates (e.g., B5) to try and hit each other’s ships. Hits and Misses: Mark hits and misses on your tracking grid. A hit means part of a ship is located at that coordinate; a miss means no ship is there. Winning: The game continues until one player sinks all of the opponent’s ships.

title: Real Motorbike Simulator Race 3D
description: Ride in the most awesome environment of this best superbike simulator 2024 which is designed especially for performing the craziest bike tricks and stunts to win amazing prizes in this Extreme Motorbike Simulator Game. the realistic physics of fast motorcycle and a lot of options to choose between different motorbikes give you unlimited fun in Extreme Motorbike Simulator 3d.
instructions: USE W,A,S,D for player movement.

title: 4 Colors Card Mania
description: 4 Colors Card Mania is a thrilling and fast-paced card game inspired by the uno gameplay. Challenge against AI opponents in this colorful and strategic showdown. Can you outwit your opponents and become the 4 Colors Card Mania champion? Shuffle the deck, deal the cards, and get ready for a colorful adventure!
instructions: Shuffle the deck, deal the cards, and get ready for a colorful adventure!

title: Sum Shuffle
description: Sum Shuffle is a puzzle game where players combine numbers to reach a target sum for each level. With both positive and negative numbers, players must strategically select and merge them. The game offers 50 levels, progressing in difficulty. Early levels are easy for beginners, but the complexity increases to challenge experienced puzzle enthusiasts. With smooth transitions and immersive sound effects, Sum Shuffle delivers an entertaining experience suitable for players of all ages.
instructions: In Sum Shuffle, use simple drag-and-drop controls to merge numbers on the screen. The goal is to reach the exact target sum at each level by combining positive and negative numbers. Strategic thinking is key as you progress through increasingly challenging levels. Achieving the correct sum allows you to advance, and each stage presents a new challenge. Your aim is to stay focused, manage numbers effectively, and enjoy the gradual rise in difficulty.

title: Ragdoll Football 2 Players
description: Ragdoll Football 2 players is an exciting and fun sports game in which you can feel like a real football player! Fight with friends or the computer by controlling a ragdoll stickman on the football field. Show your skills and wit to score grand goals and become a champion.
instructions: Control the stickman like a doll and hit the ball to score a goal against the opponent. To play with a PC, you can use: - keyboard (WASD +QE) - mouse - gamepad To play from your phone, use touch input

title: Queen of Mahjong
description: Plunge into the atmosphere of a magical world in a new game in the style of Mahjong Connect. Discover several worlds of objects by finding identical pairs of different items! Queen of Mahjong is an amazing game that will give you moments of pleasure.
instructions: Find two identical tiles to connect with 3 or less strait lines

title: Solitaire Story TriPeaks 5
description: The highly anticipated 5th installation of one of the most popular Solitaire Card Games of all time! Foxy, the game’s cute little character, will take you on a journey to new destinations, visiting distant countries, fantastic landscapes, and famous landmarks.
instructions: You have to draw cards one at a time from your stockpile. Select the cards that are one higher or one lower in value to your drawn card to remove it from the playing field. To complete a level you need to remove all the cards from the playing field without running out of cards from your stockpile. Complete the daily missions and events to unlock new deck designs and prizes that help you solve those tricky levels.

title: Devil Duck : Not a Troll Game
description: Devil Duck is an action-packed platformer game that challenges players to navigate through treacherous levels teeming with danger. Set in the fiery depths of the Devil's Domain, you play as a fearless adventurer on a quest to reclaim stolen treasures guarded by the sinister Devil King.
instructions: ARROW keys - Move

title: Super Tank Hero
description: Super Tank Hero is an action shooting game. You can drive a tank to shoot and fight on the battlefield, usually facing seven enemies and obstacles. You need to collect soldiers before the battle, they'll join your team and help you fight. You can also find energy and Life on the battlefield to increase your speed or power. When you are able to fight, follow the instructions to find your opponent and fire at him until you beat him.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Basket Sport Stars
description: A great basket challenge begins with random characters and with random basketball arenas with the Basket Sport Stars game! Play single or 2 player! The game consists of many levels, characters, and various game modes like Tournament, Quick Matches, 2 player Matches, and Practice Matches. You can play any of these modes for free, without unlocking. Pick most of the characters for free and start shooting your opponent's basket hoop!
instructions: Player 1: Move: W,A,S,D or ARROW KEYS(In 1P Mode Only) Attack: S or DOWN ARROW(In 1P Mode Only) Use gift boxes: G Player 2: Move: ARROW KEYS Attack: DOWN ARROW Use gift boxes: L

title: 3 Tiles
description: Cutely shaped picture tiles are mixed and stacked. Find the tiles in the same picture from the top and group them together. Clear the stages by removing tiles from all fields!
instructions: From piles of tiles, you can bring total 7 tiles (If you watch an ad, it extend to 8 slots) on your slot of bottom. If you bring 3 tiles with same illustration, the tiles will disappear and get points. If you continuously bring 3 tiles, you can get combo score!
